name: Light Sword
description: A light weight sharp melee weapon.

name: Elven Bow
description: A fast shooting bow made by the best elvish craftsmanship

name: Twisted Dagger
description: A ugly dagger when brandished makes enemies think twice.

name: Throwing Axes
description: A collection of small axes to throw the enemies way.

name: Dark Sword
description: A sharp black sword that when wielded strikes terror to those against it.

name: Double Swords
description: Two swords that can be dual wielded to deal double the damage
